text: Israel competed at the 1998 Winter Olympics in Nagano, Japan. The Israeli delegation included 3 figure skaters. Michael Shmerkin competed in the men's event, Galit Chait and Sergei Sakhnovski competed in ice dancing.Israel at the 1998 Nagano Winter Games == Figure skating== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- ! rowspan="2"|Athlete(s) ! rowspan="2"|Event ! ! ! / ! / ! colspan="2"|Total |- ! ! ! ! ! !Rank |-align="center" |align="left"|Michael Shmerkin |align="left"|Men's |colspan=2 |14 Q |18 |25.0 |18 |-align="center" |align="left"|Galit Chait & Sergei Sakhnovski |align="left"|Ice dancing |17 |14 |14 |14 |28.6 |14 |} == References == Category:Nations at the 1998 Winter Olympics 1998 Winter Olympics Winter Olympics
title: Israel at the 1998 Winter Olympics
